attributes.action: Stop ridiculous statements from the Archbishop of Canterbury saying that Sharia law should be used in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Britain is a Christian country, and whilst I do not mind other religions living here, they must abide by our laws.  Then the Archbishop of Canterbury makes a ridiculous statements saying that it would be OK for Muslims to use Sharia law in the UK.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
